name: Osou
description:
Osou comes from Touhou and osu! Osou is a rhythm hell meaning you have to survive a bullet hell all to the beat of a song.  So yes this game is hard; the tutorial is hard; the final levels are hard. I suggest starting with 'Beloved Tomboyish Girl' or 'Lullaby of a Deserted Hell' if you are having trouble.  

If you do well please post your scores on the Osou discord: https://discord.gg/H8t4sN95

You need a mouse to play this game

EDIT: A lot of people are downloading but no one is leaving feedback, so please if you have the time, it would mean a lot to us if you would leave some brief feedback in the comments. Constructive criticism is welcome.
